Title: TrustRadius unveils 2025 B2B disconnect between buyers and vendors
URL: https://martechseries.com/sales-marketing/trustradius-unveils-2025-b2b-disconnect-between-buyers-and-vendors/
Date Accessed: 2025-10-14

Key Passage:
"The 2025 B2B Disconnect report found that 95% of buyers feel vendor content is overly promotional, while 53% of vendors still invest heavily in gated assets buyers rarely trust. Buyers rated case studies and peer reviews as the top proof formats that create confidence." (TrustRadius, Sept 23 2025)

Context: Article summarizing TrustRadius research into B2B purchasing, highlighting buyer preference for transparent proof and distrust of hype-driven copy.
